pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, September 11, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Winnipeg, Manitoba

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Premier of Manitoba Brian Pallister will tour the Winnipeg Canada Goose factory and participate in an announcement. A media availability will follow.

Canada Goose
1450 Mountain Avenue

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the tour
    • Open coverage for the announcement and media availability
    • Media should arrive no later than 12:15 p.m.

2:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Carriage House North seniorsâ€™ residence.

Carriage House North
535 Leila Avenue  

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity
    • Media should arrive no later than 1:50 p.m.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of Intergovernmental Affairs and Northern Affairs and Internal Trade Dominic LeBlanc will meet with Premier of Manitoba Brian Pallister.

Room 204, Manitoba Legislative Building
450 Broadway

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media should arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.

Media appearances

7:05 a.m. A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on 680 CJOB AM.

7:20 a.m. A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on CBC Radio One Winnipeg.

6:00 p.m. A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on Global News at 6 Winnipeg.
